tender.title: Arrangement for Temporary Pandal, Dias, Barricading, Branding etc. for the State Level Competitions of Assam Sanskritik Mahasangram scheduled to be held from 28th Jan to 6th Feb, 2024 at 6(six) different venues at Guwahati, Assam
